verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--nindā nahe, 'sahaja' kahila
ihāte tomāra kibā aparādha haila?

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; nindā nahe—not blasphemy; sahaja—rightly; kahila—he spoke; ihāte—in this; tomāra—your; kibā—what; aparādha—offense; haila—was there.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said, "What Amogha has said is correct; therefore it is not blasphemy. What is your offense?"
